name: Polyethylene terephthalate copolymers (diethylene glycol-azelaic acid modified) prepared by the condensation of terephthalate acid (or dimethyl terephthalate) and ethylene glycol with azelaic acid and diethylene glycol. The copolymers shall be manufactured and characterized as described in the notification.
